Wife: Nonsense! You can always come to me with anything. Plus, I enjoy helping you with your creative process. Have you also tried revisiting some of the writing prompts we did in our creative writing class?
Husband: I have, but I feel like I'm just repeating the same stories over and over again.
Wife: Maybe it's time to take a step back and try something new. Have you ever tried writing in a different genre or experimenting with different styles?

Husband: You're right. Maybe it's time to try something completely different and see where it takes me.
